get:ir
func:
flow.set('unit',msg.req.params.unit); // unit# of Itach WIP2
flow.set('port',msg.req.params.port); // port# of iTach WIP2
flow.set('ir',msg.req.params.ir); //ir code to sedn
msg.payload = 'unit' + flow.get('unit') + 'port'+flow.get('port') + 'ir'+flow.get('ir')
return msg;

get:ir
func:
flow.set('unit',msg.req.params.unit); // unit# of Itach WIP2
flow.set('port',msg.req.params.port); // port# of iTach WIP2
flow.set('irfavorite',msg.req.params.irfavorite); //ir code to send
msg.payload = 'unit ' + flow.get('unit') + 'port '+flow.get('port') + 'irfavorite '+flow.get('irfavorite')
return msg;
